message:
With President Ashraf Ghani & President Rouhani. Today we met to write a new chapter in our nation’s relations. India, Iran & Afghanistan connectivity should span from culture to commerce, tradition to technology, investment to IT & people to politics.

Agreement on the establishment of a Trilateral Transport and Transit Corridor marks a new foundation of convergence between our 3 nations. This is a corridor of peace & prosperity. It will positively impact the lives of people & deepen economic ties. http://nm-4.com/u2tp
